apathetic.Name: apathetic
apathetic.Description: having or showing little or no emotion.

languid.Name: languid
languid.Description: lacking in vigor or vitality; slack or slow.

lazy.Name: lazy
lazy.Description: averse or disinclined to work, activity, or exertion; indolent.

lethargic.Name: lethargic
lethargic.Description: of, relating to, or affected with lethargy; drowsy; sluggish; apathetic.

procrastinating.Name: procrastinating
procrastinating.Description: to be putting off till another day or time; to be defering; to be delaying.

relaxed.Name: relaxed
relaxed.Description: to be free of or relieved from tension or anxiety.

slacker.Name: slacker
slacker.Description: a person who evades his or her duty or work; shirker.
